text:
Every time I click "edit profile" from the user admin screen I am redirected to
the login screen. I login and am taken back to the edit user overview page. I
click "edit profile" again and I am brought back to login page ..  continuous loop.

default publication using default user account "lenya". Can't edit lenya profile
or alice
creator: ps@nomensa.com
A.Kuckartz@ping.de
